description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A race against conbustible to travel as long as you can evading obstacles, mines, walls , flying in crazy ramps, boosting to crazy speeds of dizziness while you change between planets to gain more points.
description.short: A race against conbustible to travel as long as you can evading obstacles, mines, walls , flying in crazy ramps, boosting to crazy speeds of dizziness while you change between planets to gain more points.
